pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
pre_caption: This is a static shot of an airport runway from a low, first-person perspective. The camera is positioned at the beginning of the runway, looking down its length toward a hazy, reddish-orange sky where the sun is low on the horizon. The image has a motion blur effect, creating the illusion of rapid forward movement, although the scene itself is not moving.
